ALTW 2005

9, 10 and 11 December, University of Sydney

A two-day workshop on Natural Language Technology will be organised by the Australasian Language Technology Association (ALTA) on 10 and 11 December 2005, combined with a tutorial day on 9 December. This event will be the third annual installment of the workshop in its most-recent incarnation, and the continuation of an annual workshop series that has existed under various guises since the early 90s.

Please select one of the topics in the menu on the left hand side of the page.

The Australasian Language Technology Workshop is being organised by ALTA, the Australasian Language Technology Association.


What's New

7/12/06 There are updates to some of the proceedings papers.

21/06/06 The proceedings are now available online.

03/12/05 The programme of the tutorials has been updated.

19/11/05 Information on accommodation and registration is available. The programme and how to get there is also available.

26/10/05 All submissions have been reviewed and the notifications have been sent out. The camera ready submission system is now open.

05/09/05 More information on sponsorships is available.

05/09/05 Titles, abstracts and bios of the tutorials are available.

25/08/05 The Submission system is online. It is now possible to send in your submission.

03/08/05 Information on the Tutorials is available.

30/05/05 The Call for Papers is available.
